conclusion: The velocity v1 of the electron as it enters cylinder 1 is incorrectly calculated using kinematic equations instead of the work-energy theorem.
The analysis of the electron's motion inside cylinder 1 and between cylinders is correct but lacks verification with the work-energy theorem.
The velocity relation for v_n is correctly derived using the work-energy theorem.
The length L_n of the nth metal cylinder is correctly calculated using the velocity relation and time period.
